title: How To Install a K&N Air Intake on a 2015 Dodge Ram 1500 3.0L Diesel
description:
See how easy it is to install a K&N air intake on your 2015 Dodge Ram 1500 3.0L Diesel.

K&N 63-1571 performance air intake system is easy to install and guaranteed to increase horsepower in 2015 Dodge Ram 1500 with a 3.0L diesel engine. When dyno tested, this air intake created an estimated gain of 11.22 horsepower at 3300 RPM.

This air intake includes an oversized washable & reusable air filter that can go up to 100,000 miles between servicing. K&N air intake 63-1571 also includes a rotomolded polyethylene air intake tube and aluminum heat shield designed to increase air flow and isolate intake air from engine heat.
tags: K&N Cold Air Intake, Dodge Ram 1500, Dodge Ram Diesel, how to install k&n intake, CAI, RAM
